com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs

Class NavMenuTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • TagSupport
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.NavMenuTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NavDialogMenuTag

    public class NavMenuTag
extends TagSupport
    NavMenuTag displays the navigation menu defined in a JSP. 
     <rhn:menu mindepth="0" maxdepth="0"
     definition="/WEB-INF/navigation.xml"
     renderer="com.redhat.rhn.frontend.nav.CustomRenderer" />

    Depending on which renderer is specified the output is different. The renderer architecture gives this tag lots of flexibility as to what it can render, from a table with lots of cells, to an ASCII tree of nodes, to a simple unorder list which can decorated by CSS. The possibilities are endless.
